name: Numerus
description:
Find the correct number and break as many blocks as you can to earn score.

Numerus is arcade platformer game with simple swipe control. 
Test and train your concentration, reflexes and attention.

Find the correct number and break as many blocks as you can to earn score !

Numerus Features: - Free to play
                                   - Power up items and their upgrades
                                   - Custom look for player
                                   - Make challenges
                                   - One finger control
                                   - Endless gameplay
                                   - Train your reflexes and attention
                                   - Without ads
                                   - Choose reward based videos

                  
Numerus is easy to play but very hard to reach high scores!
Download Numerus FREE and enjoy it now!
